reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 462/01: CHANGES TO THE SUDBURY AND DISTRICT HEALTH UNIT
reg_info.reg_name_text: CHANGES TO THE SUDBURY AND DISTRICT HEALTH UNIT
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act, 2001   Loi de 2001 sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. (1) The council of the City of Greater Sudbury may appoint, as its representatives, a maximum of seven members to the Sudbury and District Health Unit. O. Reg. 462/01, s. 1 (1). (2) At least one of the seven must be a member of the council and at least one of the seven must be a person other than a member of council. O. Reg. 462/01, s. 1 (2). (3) This section applies despite subsection 7 (2) of the City of Greater Sudbury Act, 1999. O. Reg. 462/01, s. 1 (3).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The council of the City of Greater Sudbury may appoint, as its representatives, a maximum of seven members to the Sudbury and District Health Unit. O. Reg. 462/01, s. 1 (1).

(2) At least one of the seven must be a member of the council and at least one of the seven must be a person other than a member of council. O. Reg. 462/01, s. 1 (2).

(3) This section applies despite subsection 7 (2) of the City of Greater Sudbury Act, 1999. O. Reg. 462/01, s. 1 (3).
